localizedMeta.description:
Princess Fee always dreamed of a life full of adventure. As a mysterious dragon begins to attack her kingdom, Fee seizes the chance to chase this dream. Armed with nothing but a magical orb of protection and her wit, Fee is determined to defend her kingdom. Together with the snow princess Olivia and the princess sisters Dorothy and Monica, they must overcome the challenges of the dragon's castle!

- Use the power of tilt to help the four princesses maneuver their orbs through the deadly traps of the dragon's castle!

- Help the princesses band together to solve cooperative puzzles!

- Experience a thrilling story of overcoming differences set to an immersive soundtrack!

Package size: 21 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller
- Motion sensor

Supported languages:
English(United States)
